actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-375.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (S. J. Res. 115) to approve the President's recommendation for a waiver of law pursuant to the Alaska Natural Gas Transportation Act of 1976.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S.J. Res. 115 (Alaska Natural Gas Transportation Act waiver).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (S. J. Res. 115) to approve the President's recommendation for a waiver of law pursuant to the Alaska Natural Gas Transportation Act of 1976.
